contextId.occurrenceNote: The people are saying this to mock the writer. They do not really believe Yahweh will rescue him. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
contextId.glQuote: He trusts in Yahweh ... delights in him

contextId.occurrenceNote: David may have been using irony when he called Doeg this. Alternate translation: "you, who think you are so mighty" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
